name: 24D8
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Press the arrow keys to slide pieces around the board (similar to the mobile game 2048). YOUR GOAL is to remove the red pieces as they show up by sliding them into white pieces.
Higher white pieces will destroy lower red pieces.
Lower white pieces will reduce the rank of red pieces.
Sliding two pieces of the same color and number together will increase their value by 1. Whenever a red piece slides into a wall, it chips away at it. Once a wall piece is gone, red pieces can slide out and escape, losing you the game!
